metrics.title: contested election
metrics.description: A national or subnational election occurred in the country that month and was contested. Contested means: results were very close (e.g., margin <3%) OR there were credible, widespread allegations of fraud, vote-rigging, or manipulation.
metrics.rich search: (contested election OR close election OR disputed election OR election fraud OR vote rigging OR recount)

metrics.title: crop failure
metrics.description: Reports indicate widespread crop failure or major agricultural losses, often due to drought, pests, disease, or extreme weather, that month in the country.
metrics.rich search: (crop failure OR harvest failure OR agricultural losses OR drought OR famine OR pest outbreak)

metrics.title: economic concern
metrics.description: Significant economic problems reported that month, such as high inflation, rapid currency depreciation, mass unemployment, or severe recession fears.
metrics.rich search: (inflation OR unemployment OR recession OR economic crisis OR currency depreciation)

metrics.title: military coup
metrics.description: A military coup (successful or attempted, even if failed) occurred that month in the country. Defined as an attempt by armed forces to seize political power from the government.
metrics.rich search: (military coup OR junta OR army takeover OR military seized power OR coup attempt)

metrics.title: political assassination
metrics.description: An assassination (successful killing or attempted killing) of a political leader, official, or candidate took place that month in the country.
metrics.rich search: (political assassination OR assassination attempt OR killing of leader OR murdered politician)

metrics.title: natural disaster
metrics.description: A major natural disaster that month (e.g., earthquake, flood, wildfire, extreme heatwave, drought, tropical cyclone) that disrupted infrastructure, livelihoods, or economic activity.
metrics.rich search: (earthquake OR flood OR wildfire OR drought OR cyclone OR extreme weather OR natural disaster)

metrics.title: ethnic tension
metrics.description: Reports that month indicate widespread ethnic, tribal, or communal tensions or violence. This can include discrimination, clashes, riots, hate speech, or persecution targeting a specific ethnic/tribal/religious community.
metrics.rich search: (ethnic clashes OR communal violence OR tribal conflict OR hate speech OR persecution OR riots)
